TEXT.S:
caduk
siwkay nu balat u malukay a sakaluk, taneng mibelih miala ku lala'. matinpi ku tangah, sisakapetay a culay.
tinaku a kamu caduken caduken kiya lala' milacul i kazizeng.
u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika "" A shovel is a tool for digging, lifting, and moving bulk materials, such as soil, coal, gravel, snow, sand, or ore. Most shovels are hand tools consisting of a broad blade fixed to a medium-length handle. Shovel blades are usually made of sheet steel or hard plastics and are very strong. Shovel handles are usually made of wood (especially specific varieties such as ash or maple) or glass-reinforced plastic (fibreglass).
